name: Damage_Resistance
display_help: Maelstrom is resistant to some damage types.

name: Challenge_Issued
display_help: Special

name: Chemical_Ammunition
display_help: Your weapons are loaded with chemical ammunition.

name: Twin_Pistols
display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Twin_Pistols2
display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Toxic_Rain
display_help: You fire your pistols faster than the human eye can follow, causing your bullet trajectory to arc, dealing moderate Lethal damage and possibly knocking your foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: Piercing_Rounds
display_help: You fire your pistols with deadly precision in a very narrow cone, piercing your enemy. Piercing Rounds deals High lethal damage and reduces targets' Damage Resistance for a short time. Damage: High Recharge: Long NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from a resistance debuff to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

name: NO2_Ammunition
display_help: Your weapons are loaded with cryo-rounds, causing cold damage.

name: Shredder_Round
display_help: Maelstrom quickly fires a round from his remaining heavy automatic pistol.

name: Executioners_Shot
display_help: Executioner's Shot is a deadly close range attack. Foes struck by this attack will suffer lethal damage and will likely be knocked back by the impact of this attack.

name: Marked_for_Death
display_help: Maelstrom marks nearby enemies for death.

name: Time_to_Die
display_help: Maelstrom attempts to assassinate all nearby targets. Those who are Marked for Death die instantly, while those without the mark still suffer heavy damage.

name: Chased
display_help: Script

name: Storm_Kick
display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick has a greater then average chance to score a critical hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Crane_Kick
display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dragons_Tail
display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

name: Storm_Kick_Jaunt
display_help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your foes before delivering a powerful Storm Kick. Note that Storm Kick is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Fast

name: Crane_Kick_Jaunt
display_help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before delivering a crushing Crane Kick. Note that Crane Kick is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Moderate

name: Dragons_Tail_Chain
display_help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before striking with the Dragon's Tail attack. Note that Dragon's Tail Chain is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

name: Dragons_Tail_Jaunt
display_help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before striking with the Dragon's Tail attack. Note that Dragon's Tail is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Whirlwind_Burst_Tell
display_help: You perform a Whirlwind Burst that deals smashing damage to all nearby targets and knocks them back, putting them in range of your Teleport Kicks. Recharge: Slow

name: Whirlwind_Burst
display_help: You perform a Whirlwind Burst that deals smashing damage to all nearby targets and knocks them back, putting them in range of your Teleport Kicks.

name: Aura
display_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!

name: Rock
display_help: Citizens can pick up small rocks and throw them at their foes. Not much damage.

name: Molotov_Cocktail
display_help: The explosion from the Fire Bomb affects all within the blast and sets them on fire.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

name: Vengeance
display_help: The defeat of a citizen causes the remaining protesters to rally, granting all nearby citizens a combat performance buff.

name: Burn
display_help: All foes that pass through these flames will be burned.

name: Avoid
display_help: Foes will avoid this area.

name: Protection

name: Signal_Interference
display_help: The TPN Technician is interfering with your signal, allowing broadcasts loyal to Emperor Cole to break through to the masses.

name: Impenetrable_Shielding
display_help: The TPN Technician has a special shield generator which renders them effectively invincible as long as other IDF forces remain nearby. The shield goes down, however, as soon as all backup is lost.

name: Propaganda
display_help: The Telepathist has affected the minds of the citizens observing the assault on TPN and has turned them against you. Citizens affected by a Telepathists propaganda will attack using a variety of means at their disposal.

name: Pacify
display_help: You maintain a continual aura of pacification, reducing the combat effectiveness of enemy targets.

name: Telepathic_Interference
display_help: You maintain a field of interference around you which damages the neural pathways of enemies. Those around you take continual damage over time.

name: Grant_Propaganda
display_help: Script
